trans-unit.source: Defines a control inside a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control as a postback control.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控件内部的控件定义为回发控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> control to enable controls inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> to cause a postback instead of performing an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>控件，使控件内的<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>导致回发，而不是执行异步回发。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to programmatically register a postback control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterPostBackControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>要以编程方式注册的回发控件控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control when the trigger control performs a postback.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制当触发器控件将执行回发。

trans-unit.source: Programmatically adding <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> controls is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>不支持的控件。

trans-unit.source: If a control is set as both a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> and <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件设置为这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>和<xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>控件，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to declaratively define a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> control for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式定义<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: In the panel, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload> control enables users to upload a file.
trans-unit.target: 在面板中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload>控件使用户能够将文件上载。

trans-unit.source: Users must first check whether the file to upload exists.
trans-unit.target: 用户必须首先检查是否存在要上载的文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that calls the event handler to check the file name causes an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>调用事件处理程序，若要检查的文件名称的控件将导致异步回发。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that uploads the file is registered as a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>, because files cannot be uploaded asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>将文件上载控件注册为<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>，因为无法以异步方式上载文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object, use the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or create a `<Triggers>` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>对象，请使用**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框框中在设计器中或创建`<Triggers>`元素中以声明方式<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: Programmatically adding <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> controls is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>不支持的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control that is an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> control for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个控件的名称，该控件充当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a server control ID.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示服务器控件 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the trigger was activated.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指示是否已激活触发器的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the trigger was activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已激活触发器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger.HasTriggered%2A> property to provide custom logic for determining whether the trigger was activated.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger.HasTriggered%2A>属性来提供自定义逻辑，用于确定是否已激活该触发器。

trans-unit.source: To see your custom trigger appear at design time in the `<Triggers>` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, you can add an directive on the page or in the section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看你在设计时显示的自定义触发器`<Triggers>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件，在页面或 Web.config 文件的部分中，你可以添加一个指令。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> 对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger" /> 对象的字符串。
